description:
This talk is to share our journey and experience in dealing with the collection/analysis of continuous delivery log events using Jenkins with Apache Flume, ElasticSearch, Kibana and Spark. In this talk, we will review each step of our analytics journey, including how to:

- Set up a continuous delivery pipeline using the Pipeline plugin 
- Extract logs from Jenkins using Apache Flume
- Correlate data and group with a simple Spark job
- Display and understand your cycle time

The presentation and live exercises will be done using Docker VMs, which will be shared and are able to be reused.
title: Speed up your Continuous Delivery Pipeline with Jenkins
